info.title: SiteMinder REST Services
info.description:
# A REST API for Managing SiteMinder objects SiteMinder provides the following REST APIs:
  • Administrative Token API (/ca/api/sso/services/login/v1/token) The Administrative Token API provides a single call that receives Basic authentication credentials of a SiteMinder Administrator in the Authorization header. If Basic authentication for the specified administrator account is successful, the API returns a JWT token containing a session ticket.
  • Policy Data API (/ca/api/sso/services/policy/v1/...) The Policy Data API allows you to create, read, update, and delete SiteMinder objects in your policy store. Note: Each call to the Policy Data API requires a valid JWT Token obtained from the Administrative Token API as a Bearer Token in the Authorization header.
  • Policy Migration API (/ca/api/sso/services/policy/v1/deployment/...) The Policy Migration API allows you to export and import specified subsets of policy data in the policy store. Note: Each call to the Policy Data API requires a valid JWT Token obtained from the Administrative Token API as a Bearer Token in the Authorization header.
# Authenticate to Try Out Calls Use the Authenticate button at the top of this page to authenticate using SiteMinder administrator credentials. Once authenticated, you can test the API by using a Try it out! button presented for each call. Important! Use caution when using the Try it out functionality to try any write (PUT, POST, DELETE) operation as the specified call is applied to your policy store.
# Sections
Administrative Token API
Policy Migration API
Policy Data API - Core policy objects
Policy Data API - XPS objects
Policy Data API - Federation objects
Policy Data API - Access Gateway objects
Policy Data API - Certificate Data

get.description: Returns single object which can be of type SmAgent,SmDomain etc... different fields will be returned in the response body depending on the type of object returned.

put.description: Updates an object and returns the newly updated object which can be of type SmAgent,SmDomain etc... different fields will be returned in the response body depending on the type of object returned.

delete.description: Deletes an object and returns empty response.

get.summary: Fetch objects related to this object by name
get.description: Returns objects related to this object which can be of type SmAgent,SmDomain etc... different fields will be returned in the response body depending on the type of object returned.

get.summary: Fetch objects used by this object by name
get.description: Returns objects used by this object which can be of type SmAgent,SmDomain etc... different fields will be returned in the response body depending on the type of object returned.
